title: The Referee
creator_credit: Robert King, Football Association and Kay Laboratories
brief_description: How Association Football referees are selected and trained by the County Associations and the Referees Societies of Britain. The duties and essential qualities of a referee are explained and examples of situations during actual play which call for arbitration are shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert King, Football Association and Kay Laboratories
